sourcesContent:
Meetings

  • meeting.name

    meeting.startDate | date to meeting.endDate | date

    meeting.description

'Add' Meeting

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Meeting } from 'src/Models/Meeting'; import { MeetingService } from 'src/services/meeting.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { meetings: Meeting[] = []; userId: number; constructor( private meetingService: MeetingService ) {} ngOnInit(){ let localUserId = localStorage.getItem("userId"); if (localUserId !== null && localUserId !== undefined) { this.userId = +localUserId; this.getAll(this.userId) } } getAll(userId: number){ this.meetingService.getAll(userId).subscribe( (response) => { this.meetings = response as Meeting[] }, (error) => { console.log(error); }); }; }
